title: Larry Dossey on the Science of Premonitions
body:
Throughout his medical career, doctor and author of The Power of Premonitions, Larry Dossey has been intrigued by premonition. His own experience with precognition began  when he was fresh out of medical school.

Dr. Dossey discusses his personal experience with precognition, and how over the years he has collected people's experiences with premonitions, which he found were common in the medical environment.  

This distinguished Texas physician, deeply rooted in the scientific world, has become an internationally influential advocate of the role of the mind in health and the role of spirituality in healthcare. Bringing the experience of a practicing internist and the soul of a poet to the discourse, Dr. Larry Dossey offers panoramic insight into the nature and the future of medicine.
teaser: Throughout his medical career, doctor and author of The Power of Premonitions, Larry Dossey has been intrigued by premonition. His own experience with precognition began  when he was fresh out of medical school.

title: Michael Tsarion about the Irish Origins of Civilization (Part 1)
body:
Michael Tsarion discusses his belief that history as as we know it omits proofs that the highly advanced Egyptian civilization move west, to Britain, and that prior to that, the the ancient Druids moved to Egypt. 

Born in Northern Ireland, Michael Tsarion is a researcher of the occult, an author and public speaker whose topics include symbolism, sidereal astrology and Atlantis. He is also the producer and presenter of the Origins and Oracles series, which explores ancient mysteries and forbidden knowledge.

An expert on the occult histories of Ireland and America, Michael has deeply researched the comparative mythologies of the world and his own country’s ancient and mysterious Celtic tradition. 

Michael furnishes us with solutions to the moral and social predicaments that have beset humankind for millennia.
teaser: Michael Tsarion discusses his belief that history as as we know it omits proofs that the highly advanced Egyptian civilization move west, to Britain, and that prior to that, the the ancient Druids moved to Egypt.

title: Tony Redhouse on Native American Healing
body:
Growing up in Monterey, California Tony Redhouse’s father made the decision that the kids grew up knowing their heritage. This had its benefits and its burdens. Tony took this knowledge forward into his adult life as did his siblings. They emerged as musicians and healers, but this did not come without its difficulties including struggles with addictions. Knowing these places inside himself, Tony has turned his energies to healing others, including women with addictions, through his Native American arts and music.

Tony has served as a traditional Native American practitioner & consultant to Native American communities and behavioral health organizations for many years. He is a visual artist, Grammy nominated recording artist, inspirational speaker, spiritual teacher, hoop and eagle dancer and uses Native American art, dance and music to inspire and heal lives.
teaser: Tony Redhouse grew up learning the ways of his ancestors. This proved to have its benefits and its burdens. Today, Tony uses his energies to healing others, including women with addictions, through his Native American arts and music.

title: Dean Radin on Entangled Minds
body:
Dean Radin, PhD, is Senior Scientist at the Institute of Noetic Sciences (IONS). His first career as a concert violinist shifted into science after earning a masters degree in electrical engineering and a PhD in psychology from the University of Illinois, Champaign-Urbana.

For a decade he worked on advanced telecommunications R&D at AT&T Bell Laboratories and GTE Laboratories; for over two decades he has been engaged in consciousness research. Before joining the research staff at IONS, he held appointments at Princeton University, University of Edinburgh, University of Nevada, and three Silicon Valley think-tanks, including SRI International, where he worked on a classified program investigating psychic phenomena for the US government.
teaser: Dean Radin discusses quantum theory and his work on entangled minds.

title: Lee Lipsenthal on Doctors and the Medical Profession
body: Dr. Lee Lipsenthal discusses the stresses of being a doctor in the modern medical system and how we, as patients, might benefit from knowing what kind of person is sitting across the consulting table from us on our next visit.
teaser: Dr. Lee Lipsenthal discusses the stresses of being a doctor in the modern medical system and how we, as patients, might benefit from knowing what kind of person is sitting across the consulting table from us on our next visit.

title: Thom Rogers on Scalar Waves and Intention
body:
Thom Rogers discusses Scalar Waves (invisible information systems), the means by which the Quantum Field can be programmed.

This interview sheds light on what Scalar Waves are, how they operate and how can they work with consciousness to move a potential into manifestation.
teaser: Thom Rogers discusses Scalar Waves (invisible information systems), the means by which the Quantum Field can be programmed.

title: Michael Tsarion about the Irish Origins of Civilization (Part 2)
body:
In this, the second part of a two-part interview with Michael Tsarion on the Irish Origins of Civilization, he continues to discuss his belief that history as as we know it omits proofs that the highly advanced Egyptian civilization moved west, to Britain, and that prior to that the ancient Druids moved to Egypt.

Born in Northern Ireland, Michael Tsarion is a researcher of the occult, an author and public speaker whose topics include symbolism, sidereal astrology and Atlantis. He is also the producer and presenter of the Origins and Oracles series, which explores ancient mysteries and forbidden knowledge. An expert on the occult histories of Ireland and America, Michael has deeply researched the comparative mythologies of the world and his own country’s ancient and mysterious Celtic tradition.

Michael furnishes us with solutions to the moral and social predicaments that have beset humankind for millennia.
teaser: In this, the second part of a two-part interview with Michael Tsarion on the Irish Origins of Civilization, he continues to discuss his belief that history as as we know it omits proofs that the highly advanced Egyptian civilization moved west, to Britain, and that prior to that the ancient Druids moved to Egypt.

title: Dean Shrock on Why Love Heals
body:
Dr. Dean Shrock discusses why feeling heard, cared for and supported is perhaps the most potent healer of all.

As Director of Mind-Body Medicine for a physician’s management group of 40 cancer centers, Dr. Shrock developed and researched a program that he taught to cancer patients and their families. His research and experience show that nothing heals like love.
teaser: Dr. Dean Shrock discusses why feeling heard, cared for and supported is perhaps the most potent healer of all.

title: Diane Goble on Conscious Dying
body:
Diane Goble discusses how, as a young woman, she died and was shown the purpose of incarnation here on Earth.

Today she helps those who are about to cross over make it aglorious experience for themselves and their loved ones. 

First, she tells us, we need to understand why we’ve chosen the lives we live.
teaser: Diane Goble discusses how, as a young woman, she died and was shown the purpose of incarnation here on Earth.

title: James DeMeo on Orgone Energy
body:
James DeMeo, founder and director of research at the Orgone Biophysical Research Laboratory, discusses the career and research of Wilhelm Reich, an Austrian-American psychiatrist and psychoanalyst, known as one of the most radical figures in the history of psychiatry.

The Orgone Biophysical Research Laboratory, Inc., established in 1978, is a non-profit science research and educational foundation.
teaser: James DeMeo, founder and director of research at the Orgone Biophysical Research Laboratory, discusses the career and research of Wilhelm Reich, an Austrian-American psychiatrist and psychoanalyst, known as one of the most radical figures in the history of psychiatry.

title: Steve Sisgold on What’s Your Body Telling You?
body:
Steve Sisgold discusses what happens when our words say one thing and our body language says something else, and why that happens.

Steven Sisgold learned to listen to his body at a very early age. He learned that it always told him the truth, but why don’t the rest of us know this? He says conditioning from a very early age has wiped out our ability to listen to the essential clues that will guide our lives in the right direction.
teaser: Steve Sisgold discusses what happens when our words say one thing and our body language says something else, and why that happens.

title: Dr. Judy Wood on Where Did the Towers Go?
body:
This is a video and picture enhanced version of a radio interview with Dr. Judy Wood from 2009. Still, there are unanswered questions and Dr. Judy Wood provides compelling evidence to consider.

For more recent information, watch Dr. Judy Wood on The Truth about 9/11, a face-to-face interview originally webcast on September 11, 2012, the 11th anniversary of the event.
teaser: This is a video and picture enhanced version of a radio interview with Dr. Judy Wood on the anniversary of 9/11.

title: Bruce Lipton on Spontaneous Evolution
body:
Bruce Lipton, author of Spontaneous Evolution, looks at the evolution of the species as a whole. If each of us is a community of trillions of cells, how do we respond to the stimuli of our time as a global community? Dr. Lipton gives a precise overview of his work on this subject.

Bruce H. Lipton, PhD is an internationally recognized authority in bridging science and spirit. He began his scientific career as a cell biologist and received his PhD Degree from the University of Virginia at Charlottesville before joining the Department of Anatomy at the University of Wisconsin’s School of Medicine in 1973.

Dr. Lipton’s research on muscular dystrophy, studies employing cloned human stem cells, focused upon the molecular mechanisms controlling cell behavior. An experimental tissue transplantation technique developed by Dr. Lipton and colleague Dr. Ed Schultz and published in the journal Science was subsequently employed as a novel form of human genetic engineering.
teaser: Bruce Lipton, author of Spontaneous Evolution, looks at the evolution of the species as a whole. If each of us is a community of trillions of cells, how do we respond to the stimuli of our time as a global community? Dr. Lipton gives a precise overview of his work on this subject.

title: Nassim Haramein on Unification Theory (Part 1)
body: In this first of a two-part interview, Nassim Haramein discusses the acceptance of his work by mainstream physics, how all of life comes from nothing and how this knowledge affects the understanding of our world, from the smallest particle of every cell to the universes beyond our space time continuum.
teaser: In this first of a two-part interview, Nassim Haramein discusses the acceptance of his work by mainstream physics, how all of life comes from nothing and how this knowledge affects the understanding of our world, from the smallest particle of every cell to the universes beyond our space time continuum.

title: Terri Daniel on a Swan in Heaven
body:
Terri Daniel went through what every parent fears, the loss of her child. Her son, Danny was dying of a degenerative metabolic disorder, just as Terri was opening her intuitive abilities. Terri found that her intuitive bond with Danny exceeded the normal intuitive bond between parent and child when Danny finally passed over. After death he began communicating with Terri in a language that was fluent, insightful, inspired and eloquent. 

From the other side he began to teach her about family relationships. Terri and Danny’s message is filled with profound spiritual wisdom and provides clear answers to some of life’s trickiest spiritual questions. Terri talks with Regina about her experience with Danny and how she continues to help people who are looking for guidance with after-death communication.
teaser: After Danny’s death he began communicating with his mother, Terri Daniel, in a language that was fluent, insightful, inspired and eloquent. Danny’s message is filled with profound spiritual wisdom and provides clear answers to some of life’s trickiest spiritual questions.

title: Nassim Haramein on Unification Theory (Part 2)
body: In this second of a two-part interview, Nassim Haramein discusses the application of technologies, beginning in Lemuria.
teaser: In this second of a two-part interview, Nassim Haramein discusses the application of technologies, beginning in Lemuria.

title: Sonia Barrett on The Holographic Canvas
body:
Sonia Barrett, author of The Holographic Canvas: The Fusing of Mind and Matter, discusses how we create our reality, extend our time on Earth, and much more. Join this fascinating ride into the nature of perception. 

In this interview, Sonia presents her material in a way that cuts to the heart of the matter, presenting a realization that we have lived our lives as programmed beings, from birth to death.

Sonia has written many articles exploring time travel, immortality, ascension and the science of past lives, presenting concepts and ideas that stimulate thought and revive empowerment with the objective to bring clarity, insight and definition to a term now commonly used: the matrix.
teaser: Sonia Barrett, author of The Holographic Canvas: The Fusing of Mind and Matter, discusses how we create our reality, extend our time on Earth, and much more. Join this fascinating ride into the nature of perception.

title: William Henry on Lost Symbols of the Capitol
body:
William Henry discusses how the U.S. Capitol was intended as a sacred space, a temple for the people.

Thomas Jefferson called the U.S. Capitol a temple dedicated to the sovereignty of the people, and its builders called it a Temple of Liberty.

Learn about the profound meaning of the spiritual imagery and artwork of the Capitol. Regardless of your belief system or religious affiliation, this interview offers inspiration and  a powerful vision for the future.
teaser: William Henry discusses how the U.S. Capitol was intended as a sacred space, a temple for the people.

title: Judy Wicks on The Power of One
body:
Cafe owner and activist Judy Wicks discusses what prompted her first act of civil disobedience and her passion for protecting communities and small businesses from corporate takeovers.

We also learn about the origin of Judy's cafe, about the sister restaurant  program and what she learned about the relationship between war and corporate interests.
teaser: Cafe owner and activist Judy Wicks discusses what prompted her first act of civil disobedience, and her passion for protecting communities and small businesses from corporate takeovers.

title: Tom Greco on Reinventing Money
body:
Tom Greco, author of The End of Money and the Future of Civilization, discusses complimentary currencies and exchange systems.

Tom Greco is a community and monetary economist, writer, networker and consultant, who, for almost three decades, has worked at the leading edge of transformational restructuring.
teaser: Tom Greco, author of The End of Money and the Future of Civilization, discusses complimentary currencies and exchange systems.

title: Steven Hairfield on the 12 Sacred Principles of Karma
body:
Steven Hairfield discuss the 12 sacred principles of karma and how western-influenced people can better understand and apply them. 

Steven learned from true masters, and spent many years in a monastery working through each step.
teaser: Steven Hairfield discuss the 12 sacred principles of karma and how western-influenced people can better understand and apply them.

title: Kenny Johnson from Prison to Peace
body:
For thirty-one years Kenny Johnson’s most fervent desire was to hear his name “ringing in the streets” as a hustler, thief, and pimp. Running parallel with that desire was a persistent seed of spiritual longing that would not leave him alone. In 1995, while still behind prison walls, Kenny experienced a spiritual awakening so profound that it transformed not only his prior conditioning as a criminal but his very field of consciousness. 

In the vast stillness that overwhelmed his mind and heart, he witnessed with intimate clarity the bondage the entire human experience is subject to and exactly where eternal freedom can be found. Kenny is currently the founder of “This Sacred Space,” a non-profit organization that facilitates meditation and self-inquiry groups both in and out of prisons.
teaser: For thirty-one years Kenny Johnson’s most fervent desire was to hear his name “ringing in the streets” as a hustler, thief, and pimp. While behind prison walls, Kenny experienced a spiritual awakening so profound that it transformed his very field of consciousness.

title: Rick Hanson on Buddha’s Brain
body:
Neurophysiologist Rick Hanson, co-author of Buddha’s Brain, tells us that neuroscience can help us understand what’s happening in a brain when it is in a desired state so that we can work backward and figure out how to use the mind—not drugs—to stimulate and strengthen the underlying neural states that promote that mental state.
 
Hanson has written and taught extensively about the essential inner skills of personal well being, psychological growth and contemplative practice, as well as about relationships, family life and raising children.
teaser: Neurophysiologist Rick Hanson, co-author of Buddha’s Brain, tells us that neuroscience can help us understand what’s happening in a brain when it is in a desired state so that we can work backward and figure out how to use the mind—not drugs—to stimulate and strengthen the underlying neural states that promote that mental state.

title: Timothy Freke on Lucid Living
body:
Philosopher and author Timothy Freke discusses embracing all of our parts in the journey back to our true selves.

Tim Freke had an awakening at the age of 12 and has spent the rest of his life seeking to understand how to be spiritually awake in the perpetual now, as well as passionately engaged with the adventure of life.
teaser: Philosopher and author Timothy Freke discusses embracing all of our parts in the journey back to our true selves.

title: David Daniels on the Essential Enneagram
body:
Dr. David Daniels is a clinical Professor of Psychiatry at Stanford Medical School. There was a time when he had to hide his interest in the system of typology, known as the Enneagram, from his co-workers.  But, after studying the incredible potential of this system of personality typology, he couldn’t keep it a secret any longer. Today, after authoring one of the primary guides to the subject, The Essential Enneagram, and conducting in-depth studies, David believes the Enneagram is one of the most powerful tools, out there, to help heal our relationship with ourselves and others.

A centuries-old psychological system with roots in sacred tradition, the Enneagram can be an invaluable guide in your journey toward self-understanding and self-development.
teaser: Dr. David Daniels is a clinical Professor of Psychiatry at Stanford Medical School and believes the Enneagram is one of the most powerful tools to help heal our relationship with ourselves and others.

title: Stephanie Rearick on Time Banking
body:
Musician Stephanie Rearick discusses the practical aspects of Time Banking – a system of barter that trades one hour of time for one hour of time, regardless of skill or profession. Time Banking is based on the philosophy that communities work better when all contributions are valued, regardless of the type of work.

Stephanie is part of the Dane County Time Bank, a network of individuals and organizations in Dane County, WI,  working to increase efficiency, opportunity and resource sharing through mutually beneficial exchange.
teaser: Musician Stephanie Rearick discusses the practical aspects of Time Banking, a system of barter that trades one hour of time for one hour of time, regardless of skill or profession. Time Banking is based on the philosophy that communities work better when all contributions are valued, regardless of the type of work.

title: Gregg Braden on Fractal Time
body: For any of you who are intrigued with the epoch timeframe involving 2012, you may find this conversation with Gregg Braden one of the most satisfying, yet.  As a man of science, Gregg has dug deeply into the lore and science supporting the notion that a great cycle of change is playing out. This is augmented by a math technology that shows relationships between seed events and repeated events.  In this mix is human choice.  It’s our choice, according to Gregg, as to the outcome of the 2012, phenomena.
teaser: In a much awaited follow up interview with Gregg Braden, Regina discusses his vision of 2012 and the next great cycle from the perspective of Fractal Time, the title of Gregg’s latest book.

title: Jessica Murray on Facing Denial
body: With all of the grand events that seem to be playing out across the world, we met up once again with Jessica Murray, to see how the stars point to the opportunities embedded within the challenges. Our conversation about the astrological chart of the United States has been the focus of our discourse, and each stage has come to pass with the great challenge and opportunities still lying ahead. Relax and dial into this one. We go deeper and deeper as the interview progresses.
teaser: With all of the grand events that seem to be playing out across the world, we met up once again with Jessica Murray, to see how the stars point to the opportunities embedded within the challenges.

title: Shaikh Kabir Helminski on the Heart of Sufism
body: Of all the religions of the world, one of the most mystical is that of Sufism. Its roots are Islamic, and the practice is one of the heart. Shaikh Kabir Helminski was the first westerner recognized as a Shaikh, or elder in the Mevlevi Order of Sufism, which dates back to the Thirteenth Century, and is based on the works of the great poet and philosopher, Rumi. In the West, we know little of this tradition other than the beautiful poems of Rumi, which have been excerpted to appear on greeting cards. Here, Shaikh Helminski explains that, among other things, Sufism has been at the heart of Islam, but has been marginalized, somewhat, by extremism.
teaser: Shaikh Kabir Helminski was the first westerner recognized as a Shaikh, or elder in the Mevlevi Order of Sufism. He explains that, among other things, Sufism has been at the heart of Islam, but has been marginalized by extremism.

title: Ellen Brown on the Web of Debt
body:
Ellen Brown explains the seeds of the current economic situation and why the system must be changed if we are to create a sustainable peaceful economy. She is the author of, The Web of Debt: The Shocking Truth about Our Money System and How We Can Break Free. It is an extremely enlightening and remarkable book, providing an understanding to our world and the current economic crisis and providing monetary and banking solutions that will take us out of this crisis and benefit the people. 

In this interview she talks extensively on money and what is needed to end the Federal Reserve. She gives a compact history on money lending reaching back to the days of Benjamin Franklin in early America where he set up a public bank in Pennsylvania that sounds much like what we need, today.
teaser: Ellen Brown explains the seeds of the current economic situation and why the system must be changed if we are to create a sustainable peaceful economy. In this interview she talks extensively on money and what is needed to end the Federal Reserve.

title: Chris Martenson on Economics, Energy and Environment
body:
Chris Martenson is not an economist! He is trained as a scientist, having completed both a PhD and a post-doctoral program at Duke University, where he specialized in neurotoxicology. His extensive training as a scientist informs and guides how he thinks on economics, energy, and the environment.

Crash Course, by Chris Martenson, is a free online course on the history of money and debt in the US that should be a mandatory part of our continuing education.  You may find it fascinating to understand how money and debt is created, and how we have ended up in the inevitable position we find ourselves in now.
teaser: Chris Martenson is not an economist! He is trained as a scientist, having completed both a PhD and a post-doctoral program at Duke University, where he specialized in neurotoxicology. His extensive training as a scientist informs and guides how he thinks on economics, energy, and the environment.

title: Chris Spheeris on Creativity
body:
What would a world without beauty and creativity be like?  I think most of us would answer not worth living in. Still, how much time do we take to create beauty, be it music, drawing, sewing, woodwork, poetry, or anything at all? Some people, like Chris Spheeris, make a life of creating. Aside from selling more than a million CDs and winning awards for his music, Chris creates something new every day, from photography, gardening and poetry, to fixing old clocks, Chris says we were born to create.

What does the future hold for this artist? In his own words, “Images, musical and spiritual journeys, a celebration of life, and whatever else inspiration brings. Whatever is most inspiring to me, I work to translate into a form of expression and communication. That is my fundamental nature and my job, always has been.”
teaser: Chris Spheeris says we were born to create. He makes a life of creating. Aside from selling more than a million CDs and winning awards for his music, Chris creates something new every day, from photography, gardening and poetry, to fixing old clocks

title: Rocco Errico on the Aramaic Origins of the Bible
body:
Ordained minister Dr. Rocco A. Errico says it’s wise to look at the original language of the New Testament to understand it. Dr. Errico discusses the true meaning of words that have been misinterpreted in their translations and how they have affected our thoughts and beliefs.

Dr. Rocco is one of the nation’s leading Biblical scholars, working from the original Aramaic Peshitta texts. He is proficient in Aramaic and Hebrew exegesis, helping thousands of readers and seminar participants understand how the Semitic context of culture, language, idioms, symbolism, mystical style, psychology, and literary amplification (the Seven Keys that unlock the Bible) are essential to understanding this ancient spiritual document.
teaser: Errico discusses the true meaning of words that have been misinterpreted in their translations and how they have affected our thoughts and beliefs.

title: Sarah McLean on Meditation
body:
Sarah McLean, the founding director of the Sedona Meditation Training Company, explains why silence and listening is so important in our lives. She has been teaching meditation and mind/body health programs since the early 1990s. 

Sarah offers programs that demystify meditation as her mission is to serve as a catalyst for transformation, and she loves to create opportunities for ‘aha’ moments through meditation retreats and classes.
teaser: Sarah McLean, the founding director of the Sedona Meditation Training Company, explains why silence and listening is so important in our lives.

title: Laura Alden Kamm on Being a Medical Intuitive
body:
Known as the Walking MRI for her ability to see into the human body, Laura Alden Kamm discusses her awakening, her gift and her ability to teach others to be able to do the same. While attending Indiana State University in 1982, Laura’s life was transformed when she awoke one morning with a searing pain in her head. Within 11 days she was totally blind. Several hours later, she died in an ambulance.

Laura crossed over to the Other Side and had an extraordinary near-death experience. She recovered, partially blind and with a rare and precise gift of inner sight. She described to her neurosurgeon how she physically saw particles and ribbons of colors within and around everything, to which he replied, “Laura, it will be 100 years before Western science finds out what really happened to you.”
teaser: Known as the Walking MRI for her ability to see into the human body, Laura Alden Kamm discusses her awakening, her gift and her ability to teach others to be able to do the same.

title: Lloyd Mear on Energy Balancing by Numbers
body:
In this fascinating interview with Lloyd Mear, Regina explores how numbers work and delves into the type of healing the body is able to perform on itself with the combination of energy, intention, and the right numerical sequence. Mear explains that it’s not unlike a radio that you tune into a certain number on a dial to get a specific frequency in order to listen to a program. If that number is slightly off, all you get is static. If you can’t hear the program, you must adjust the number. More precisely, you need to adjust the healing numbers to improve the positive energy in your body.
Lloyd Mear was ahead of his time when he came to the understanding that each and every ailment, nutrient, emotion, and so forth, has its own frequency signified by a sequence of numbers or “healing code.” After years of research, he found that by reciting the correlative number for balancing a particular ailment, that the body would respond the same as with a physical antidote. It is, loosely speaking, a matter of energy healing by the numbers. He distilled these insights into the Energy Balancing Numbers Manual, which helps individuals balance the energetic body.
teaser: Civil engineer Lloyd Mear explains how numbers can represent frequencies and be used to balance energies in the body.

title: Steven Ross on Lost Healing Methods
body:
Steven Ross, author of And Nothing Happened, discusses powerful healing technologies that have been bypassed or deliberately ignored by the medical profession, in spite of the fact that many of the inventors and practitioners were medical doctors themselves.Though medical and health costs continue to rise, acceptable solutions are not being offered for any of our major health challenges. Pharmaceutical drugs or repeated surgeries should not be your only option. Is there an alternative to the manner in which we treat disease? Steven Ross knows so, as he has researched nearly all possible alternatives.

Steven Ross sits down with Regina to talk about the better solutions for our health care and why these solutions have been excluded from common medical practice.
teaser: Steven Ross, author of And Nothing Happened, discusses powerful healing technologies that have been bypassed or deliberately ignored by the medical profession, in spite of the fact that many of the inventors and practitioners were medical doctors themselves.

title: Tom Campbell on My Big TOE
body:
Tom Campbell discusses his 35 years of research and investigation into altered states of consciousness.

Campbell began his research with Bob Monroe, of the Monroe Institute researching states of consciousness while working his day job developing missile defense systems. Campbell also discusses his book, My Big TOE (Theory of Everything), in which he summarizes how we create and experience our own reality.

He and a few others were the early drug-free consciousness pioneers that helped design experiments, develop the technology for creating specific altered states, and volunteer as the subjects of study.
teaser: Tom Campbell discusses his 35 years of research and investigation into altered states of consciousness.

title: Michael Horn on The Prophecies
body:
In this follow-up interview, Michael Horn continues past the context and background of Billy Meier to talk about The Prophecies themselves. Michael delves into the more controversial and challenging subjects that require an open mind and genuine spirit of inquiry. In the end, one should only accept what feels true in our own hearts. 

Many examples of Meier’s prophesies have already served as sufficient proof, for many diligent researchers, that this case is authentic. The most recent confirmation is nothing short of stunning. Meier published his prophesies in dated, copyrighted form long before the discoveries were made. This dismisses the last complaint of the skeptics that Meier could have back-dated his material, which is obviously impossible, as many people have already long since discovered.
teaser: In this follow-up interview, Michael Horn continues past the context and background of Billy Meier to talk about The Prophecies themselves.

title: Brian O’Leary on Free Energy
body:
Brian O’Leary has seen more than just about any civilian when it comes to the world of free energy, or Zero Point energy devices. As an idealistic young PhD in space sciences, he was slated to go to Mars on a NASA mission, when the Viet Nam War shifted the U.S.’s priorities.  Instead, he became a professor, teaching at Cornell, alongside Carl Sagan, and later at Princeton in the Physics Department. Ultimately, his broad curiosity about future technologies in space brought him to the understanding that only through free and clean energy can we progress as a global species. The rub has been that vested interests have thwarted this progress at every turn.

On one of Brian’s rare visits to the US, after moving to Ecuador, Regina asks him about the pattern of suppression of energy devices that could have provided a solution to our energy demands. They also speak of his history of helping to protect those who are brave enough to step out and present such solutions, especially when it upsets the military industrial complex.

His message is clear. We have to be more demanding about our energy sources and realize that it is up to us to make the necessary changes.
teaser: Brian O’Leary has seen more than just about any civilian when it comes to the world of free energy, or Zero Point energy devices. On one of Brian’s rare visits to the US, Regina asks him about the pattern of suppression of energy devices that could have provided a solution to our energy demands.

title: Leonid Sharashkin on The Art of Soaring
body:
Translator Leonid Sharashkin discusses, with outrageous humor and imagination, the art of changing your reality by changing your inner world. Sharashkin describes techniques and shares examples of how people have put the power of imagination back into their lives to create permanent solutions to problems. The key to all of this is fun and laughter, something that is easy to forget sometimes.

Leonid Sharashkin came into contact with a book titled, The Art of Soaring, at a time when he needed some serious emotional adjustment. He found the work to be profound and chose to bring the book to the English-speaking world, just as he did with, Anastasia.
teaser: Leonid Sharashkin came into contact with a book titled, The Art of Soaring, at a time when he needed some serious emotional adjustment. He found the work to be profound and chose to bring the book to the English-speaking world, just as he did with, Anastasia.

title: Mahendra Trivedi on Super Human Intention
body:
Mahendra Trivedi discusses his ability to focus intentional consciousness. His abilities enable him to focus and project healing energy, enough to reach thousands of people in a crowd, to charge seeds for healthy crops and heal orchards, bodies of polluted water and just about anything else that is out of balance. Trivedi’s abilities and his body have been scientifically validated through more than 4,000 studies, and his work has become known as the Trivedi Effect. 

Mahendra Kumar Trivedi was born in 1963 in a small town in central India. Although he was not trained in the traditional Yogic education, he exhibited unique abilities and extraordinarily high levels of perception and intelligence as a child, including a 100% photographic memory. He says he always knew he was different and even as a tiny boy that he felt that his sojourn on this planet was for a higher purpose.
teaser: Mahendra Trivedi abilities enable him to focus and project healing energy, enough to reach thousands of people in a crowd, to charge seeds for healthy crops and heal orchards, bodies of polluted water and just about anything else that is out of balance.

title: Sheila Gillette: Channeling THEO
body:
Sheila Gillette has been channeling for over 40 years as a spiritual medium and direct voice channel for the angelic mentors known as THEO, assisting humanity as it shifts to a higher state of consciousness. In this interview, Sheila talks us through how she came to start channeling and the experience of taking this information out into the world at a time when it was not common to do so, even more so than now.

Taking human potential to a whole new level, THEO provides the tools to transcend the limitations of the physical world and enter into the timeless dimensions of the soul. As you awaken to this unlimited spiritual energy, you will feel the joy and excitement of manifesting peak spiritual experiences and illumination that until now have been thought to be the exclusive domain of saints and mystics.
teaser: Sheila Gillette shares her near-death experience, and how she became a channel for the consortium of twelve archangels known as THEO.

title: Aajonus Vonderplanitz on The Primal Diet
body:
Aajonus Vonderplanitz had to fight for his life from a very early age. His story is challenging. After experiencing many injuries and illnesses, the medical care he received took him deeper and deeper into a downward spiral until, in his early 20s, facing another bout with cancer, he decided to fast himself to death. The hand of fate, however, did not allow him to die. In the end it was raw animal fats and proteins that saved his life.  He says it’s fat that saves many of our lives, too.

This interview lays out his life in clear detail and explains the reason he eventually ate raw meat in an event that would change his life forever. Just listen and judge for yourself and bear in mind that Aajonus is not promoting that everyone should eat this way but that everyone could benefit from questioning their diet and the belief in medical information
teaser: Aajonus Vonderplanitz had an amazingly difficult start to life and his story is almost beyond belief. This interview lays out his life in clear detail and explains the reason he eventually ate raw meat in an event that would change his life forever.

title: Bert Janssen on Crop Circles
body:
If you’ve ever considered taking a journey into the crop circles you’ve likely come across the name, Bert Janssen. Bert’s path began with the fascination with the world’s ancient cultures, where he began to see a similar theme to the teachings arise. Being an intellectual, however, he could not find the practical implications of the knowledge until he made the acquaintance of an American shaman who gave Bert the context for his discoveries in the crop circles.

From the way Bert Janssen looks at it, crop circles are the greatest mystery of modern times. According to Bert, these are images, or voices of light, in a world that is void of such light. His website, Crop Circles and More, was founded to understand what is happening with this mystery whether the understanding is on the conscious or subconscious level. With that concept, we are touching on one of the most fascinating aspects of this phenomenon. The phenomenon speaks to us on all thinkable levels – conscious, subconscious and super conscious.
teaser: From the way Bert Janssen looks at it, crop circles are the greatest mystery of modern times. Being an intellectual, however, he could not find the practical implications of the knowledge until he made the acquaintance of an American shaman who gave Bert the context for his discoveries in the crop circles.

title: Michael Beckwith on His Life Journey
body:
Michael Beckwith, founder of the Agape International Spiritual Center, shares his spiritual journey, beginning with his concern that he belonged in a mental institution.

Beckwith teaches meditation, scientific prayer, and speaks at conferences and seminars. He is the originator of the Life Visioning Process, a time-tested technique for putting a stop to being a passive tourist in one’s life. He is author of Spiritual Liberation, which won the Gold Medal Nautilus Book Award, Inspirations of the Heart, which was a Nautilus Book Award finalist; Forty Day Mind Fast Soul Feast; A Manifesto of Peace; and Living from the Overflow.
teaser: Michael Beckwith, founder of the Agape International Spiritual Center, shares his spiritual journey, beginning with his concern that he belonged in a mental institution.

title: Sheila Gillette 2 on Channeling THEO Live
body:
In this interview Regina speaks directly with the THEO Group, the consortium of twelve archangels channeled by Sheila Gillette. Theo shares information about some of the energetic challenges facing mankind, what can be done to help manage them, and what life will be like in the future when we move, in mass, into the finer fifth-dimensional field.

Sheila Gillette has been channeling for over 40 years as a spiritual medium and direct voice channel for the angelic mentors known as Theo, assisting humanity as it shifts to a higher state of consciousness.
teaser: In this interview Regina speaks directly with the THEO Group, who shares information about some of the energetic challenges facing mankind, what can be done to help manage them, and what life will be like in the future when we move, in mass, into the finer fifth-dimensional field.

title: Burt Goldman on Quantum Jumping
body: Burt Goldman, also known as the American Monk, considers himself a lucky man. Unlike many, he recognized his path early in life, after an encounter with a mystic while serving in the military, in Korea. This meeting led to a lifelong commitment to understanding the essence of conscious intention and personal growth. As he studied with Yogananda, he became the top Silva method instructor and later, struck out on his own to share his secrets of life and new skills. Mr. Goldman’s visualization technique, called Quantum Jumping, is designed for manifesting our greatest potentials through guided meditation. His own life is living proof of it. Keep an open mind and explore the Quantum Jumping program.
teaser: Renowned energy healer and self-help expert Burt Goldman shares his secrets of life with his own method, called Quantum Jumping.

title: Lucia René on Unplugging the Patriarchy
body:
Lucia Rene´, author of Unplugging the Patriarchy, explains that the cycle of patriarchy did not occur by happenstance; that, in fact, there was an agreement on a collective spiritual level that enabled the masculine to take the lead and learn the lessons embodied within that experience.

Lucia René has been a professional actress, a computer science consultant, a teacher of self-discovery, and more recently, a writer. Her exploration of consciousness, which has spanned 40 years, drew her to the practices of Hinduism, Zen, Vadriyana Buddhism, and Advaita and culminated in a 17-year apprenticeship to an enlightened master of American Buddhism, psychic development, and mysticism.

She was ordained as a Buddhist monk and lectured on meditation and mysticism at universities throughout the United States including University of California, University of Colorado, and Northwestern University.
teaser: Lucia Rene´, author of Unplugging the Patriarchy, explains that the cycle of patriarchy did not occur by happenstance; that, in fact, there was an agreement on a collective spiritual level that enabled the masculine to take the lead and learn the lessons embodied within that experience.

title: Candace Silvers on Insights and Possibilties
body:
Many of the boomer generation of Americans grew up with the television program called The Phil Silvers Show. This caustic, zany TV character was also a husband and a father, and today his daughter Candace Silvers credits her dad with giving her the insights needed to grow into her role as motivational trainer and teacher. Never having left Hollywood, Candace also speaks to the responsibility the motion picture industry has to a world struggling to deal with rapid change and stress.

The rapid success of her acting, directing, producing, and writing students has led Candace to create a program for all careers and lifestyles. Clients are taught the ability to observe their habits and patterns so that new responses are developed as opportunities, replacing obstacles that were previously perceived through their individual histories.
teaser: Many of the boomer generation of Americans grew up with the television program called The Phil Silvers Show. Today, his daughter Candace Silvers credits her dad with giving her the insights needed to grow into her role as motivational trainer and teacher.

title: Dolores Cannon on ET’s and Human Evolution
body: Dolores Cannon reveals the new messages coming through her thousands of hypnotherapy clients regarding the changes that are in motion for humanity, specifically, our evolution as a species. What she is being told is that we have two distinctly different outcomes ahead, depending on how we choose to develop our own vibrations. In this interview, she talks about how ET’s are keeping a watchful eye on our human evolution and the two distinctly different outcomes that lie ahead for us.
teaser: Dolores Cannon reveals the new messages coming through her thousands of hypnotherapy clients regarding the changes that are in motion for humanity, specifically, our evolution as a species.

title: Michael Tsarion on the Emerging Feminine
body:
Michael Tsarion and Regina sit down to talk to about the emerging feminine. In this interview, Michael provides a deep look at the suppression of women throughout history. There is a growing need for the feminine to come to the forefront, again, for the sake of humanity. 

An expert on the occult histories of Ireland and America, has made the deepest researches into the comparative mythologies of the world and into his own country’s ancient and mysterious Celtic Tradition. His presentations on Atlantis and the origins of evil have been acclaimed by veterans in the field of paranormal research.
teaser: Michael Tsarion and Regina sit down to talk to about the emerging feminine. In this interview, Michael provides a deep look at the suppression of women throughout history. There is a growing need for the feminine to come to the forefront, again, for the sake of humanity.

title: Andrew Harvey on Sacred Activism
body:
Known for his work with Sacred Activism, Andrew Harvey was inspired to talk about many of the things that people shy away from: picking something you are totally passionate about and then doing something about it. Most people will want to respond to this call in a different style than Andrew. However, the call is still being made. Where do YOU stand, and WHAT are you going to do about it? Watch this interview and you will know the answer to at least the first question.

Andrew was born in south India in 1952 where he lived until he was nine years old. It is this early period that he credits with shaping his sense of the inner unity of all religions and providing him with a permanent and inspiring vision of a world infused with the sacred. He left India to attend private school in England and entered Oxford University in 1970 with a scholarship to study history. At the age of 21, he became the youngest person ever to be awarded a fellowship to All Soul’s College, England’s highest academic honor
teaser: Known for his work with Sacred Activism, Andrew Harvey was inspired to talk about many of the things that people shy away from: picking something you are totally passionate about and then doing something about it.

title: Barbara Marx Hubbard on Women Waking to Purpose
body:
Barbara Marx Hubbard refers to herself as an evolutionary. Born with a curious mind, asking even more curious questions, it was not until Barbara was finished with her childrearing that she expressed her own voice in the form of Conscious Evolution. Her most recent expression is a film titled, Visions of a Universal Humanity. In this conversation she speaks of the future of humankind as being dependent upon women waking to their purpose, which will necessitate a new kind of partnership.

Buckminster Fuller has called Barbara Marx Hubbard “the best informed human now alive regarding futurism and the foresights it has produced.” Widely regarded as his philosophical heir, Barbara is a social innovator, speaker, author, educator and leader in the new worldview of conscious evolution.
teaser: Barbara Marx Hubbard refers to herself as an evolutionary. Born with a curious mind, asking even more curious questions, it was not until Barbara was finished with her childrearing that she expressed her own voice in the form of Conscious Evolution.

title: José Argüelles on The Mayan Calendar
body:
José Arguelles has been working for more than 50 years to assist humanity in becoming aware of our destiny as a species at this point of change. He was the driving force behind the creation of Earth Day and the Harmonic Convergence, in which he called upon Mankind to respect the Earth and hold a higher vision of our future. His greatest work, however, has been in helping uncover the meaning of the Mayan Calendar at a time when Time matters. He says this system of natural time cycles was brought to Earth to counter the negative effects on human consciousness of the Gregorian calendar.

Regina sat down to talk to José after his lecture at the Prophet’s Conference in Vancouver in the summer of 2010 to dig deeper into the purpose of the Mayan Calendar as opposed to the Gregorian calendar. Was the calendar created to counter man’s understanding of time and was it created by beings from other dimensions to leave clues about our assumptions?
teaser: Regina sat down to talk to José Arguelles after his lecture at the Prophet’s Conference in Vancouver in the summer of 2010 to dig deeper into the purpose of the Mayan Calendar as opposed to the Gregorian calendar.

title: Leonard Horowitz on The Love Frequency
body:
Dr. Leonard Horowitz can tell you more about the world’s most urgent problems, and who is creating them, than possibly anyone on earth. But he prefers to tell you about the suppressed solutions, and how “We The People” are manifesting them.

In this interview we get an update on the H5N1 flu virus that is anticipated to emerge at the end of 2010, as well as his views on big pharma.
teaser: Dr. Leonard Horowitz can tell you more about the world’s most urgent problems, and who is creating them, than possibly anyone on earth. But he prefers to tell you about the suppressed solutions, and how “We The People” are manifesting them.

title: Lucy Wyatt on Approaching Chaos
body:
Author Lucy Wyatt explores the cycles in which the rise and fall of empires drives our evolution and devolution. In her book, Approaching Chaos, she also speaks of the Roman Empire as the fall of humankind’s spiritual consciousness.

Approaching Chaos examines an alternative: an ancient archetype dating from the Bronze Age that helped cities exist in harmony with Nature. This archetype influenced the ancient Greeks and Romans, often mistakenly admired as examples of civilized societies. Aspects of the archetype re-emerged at the time of the Gothic cathedrals, and again in the Renaissance. Now, is the time to re-connect with the original model for us to have a future.
teaser: Author Lucy Wyatt explores the cycles in which the rise and fall of empires drives our evolution and devolution. In her book, Approaching Chaos, she also speaks of the Roman Empire as the fall of humankind’s spiritual consciousness.

title: Michael St.Clair on Radiant Zones
body:
In this interview, Regina talks with Michael St. Clair about what it means to create a Radiant Zone and about the future financial outlook for most countries. Michael discusses the imperative that each one of us chooses the place we call home, our relationships and the means of thriving through the times ahead.  He calls it the path of living in Radiant Zones.

Among Michael’s noted 1999 predictions were rising oil and gold prices, the falling dollar, the collapse of housing markets, the 2000 US ballot recount, as well as future elections and re-elections of key heads of states. He foresaw the wars, global land degradation and ever more powerful hurricanes, while developing his highly original insights about the future mind of mankind.
teaser: Michael St. Clair  discusses the imperative that each one of us chooses the place we call home, our relationships and the means of thriving through the times ahead.  He calls it the path of living in Radiant Zones.

title: Henrietta Wells on Homeopathy
body:
Homeopathic practitioner and author Henrietta Wells discusses the quantum physics behind homeopathy, and the creator of homeopathy, Samuel Hahnemann, a German physician who claimed that the medicine of his time did as much harm as good.

Wells explains that homeopathy is like-treating-like, while conventional medicine uses opposing remedies.
teaser: Homeopathic practitioner and author Henrietta Wells discusses the quantum physics behind homeopathy, and the creator of homeopathy, Samuel Hahnemann, a German physician who claimed that the medicine of his time did as much harm as good.

title: Peter Taylor on Alchemy
body:
One of the real enigmas within the history of science is that the original members of the British Royal Society, men such as Isaac Newton, were what author Peter Taylor calls, alchemists. In this interview, we cover a lot of ground, from the alchemical origins of modern science to the financial boardrooms of City of London banks.

Peter Taylor is a natural scientist who has written a book called, Chill, in which he warns that the world is cooling and that solutions proposed at Copenhagen ignore the risks of starvation, resource depletion, threats to ecosystems and a possible return of the Ice Age.
teaser: In this interview, with Peter Taylor, a lot of ground is covered from the alchemical origins of modern science to the financial boardrooms of City of London banks.

title: Graham Hancock on Entangled
body:
Grahm Hancock discusses his first work of fiction, Entangled, a fast-paced story of two women who become entangled through Time and Space. Graham explains why he turned to fiction and what is important about the message that we all have divine sovereignty over our own heart and mind.

Known for the detailed work in his major international bestsellers (The Sign and The Seal, Fingerprints of the Gods, and Heaven’s Mirror), Entangled is science journalist Graham Hancock’s first novel, about two brave women at opposite ends of the Universe.
teaser: Grahm Hancock discusses his first work of fiction, Entangled, a fast-paced story of two women who become entangled through Time and Space. Graham explains why he turned to fiction and what is important about the message that we all have divine sovereignty over our own heart and mind.

title: Gregory Sams on the Sun of God
body:
Gregory Sams discusses what he calls, the longest running cover up in history, how humanity has deliberately been driven away from the understanding of, contact with and appreciation of the huge ball of life that we call the Sun.

A pioneer in natural foods, in 1982 Gregory Sams conceived and launched the original VegeBurger. In 1990 he moved into fractals, founding Strange Attractions, the world’s only shop dedicated to chaos theory.
teaser: Gregory Sams discusses what he calls, the longest running cover up in history, how humanity has deliberately been driven away from the understanding of, contact with and appreciation of the huge ball of life that we call the Sun.

title: Michael Tellinger on Slave Species of God
body:
There’s been a seemingly missing link between Zecharia Sitchen’s interpretation of the Sumerian tablets and physical evidence of the alleged gold mining clone species of the Anunnaki—that is, until now. Michael Tellinger and his partner, Johan Heine, have brought an ancient civilization, in South Africa, to the center of Zecharia Sitchen’s thesis on the Anunnaki.  

After a 30-year long obsession with the origins of humankind and the genetic anomalies of our species, he took some time out to write Slave Species of god, which became an instant bestseller in South Africa. When Johan Heine exposed the mystery of the stone ruins of South Africa to Michael in 2007, they began an irreversible process of research that led Michael to some startling scientific conclusions and the completion of two more books, Adam’s Calendar and Temples Of The African Gods.
teaser: Michael Tellinger is a scientist in the true sense of the word, never shying away from controversial issues, scrutinizing every clue meticulously to bring an ancient civilization, in South Africa, to the center of Zecharia Sitchen’s thesis on the Anunnaki.

title: Michael Tellinger on Contributionism
body: I’ve interviewed a few people in the past who address the need for communities to come back together in a new kind of economy in which we give of our time and our talents, and receive the same from others.  In the United States it’s called Time Banking, which is going strong in Madison, Wisconsin, and a few other cities. In South Africa, where there’s a 50 percent unemployment rate, at this moment in the fall of 2010, Michael Tellinger is prepared to put what he calls Contributionism center stage of South Africa’s politics and society. He lays out the platform in this conversation in which he calls for a world without money.
teaser: In this interview with Michael Tellinger, he talks about his desire to run for office in South Africa on a platform of contributionism, a way of thriving as a community.

title: Jean Slatter on Hiring the Heavens
body:
Naturopathic physician Jean Slatter, author of Hiring the Heavens, discusses the law of grace. She explains that we can request help from a talented and willing world of energy.

Slatter tells us that grace is available to us regardless of who we are, what we’ve done or what our circumstances are. There is nothing that we must do to earn it, and there is nothing that we can do to have it taken from us.
teaser: Naturopathic physician Jean Slatter, author of Hiring the Heavens, discusses the law of grace. She explains that we can request help from a talented and willing world of energy.

title: John Perkins on Hoodwinked
body:
Former economic hit man John Perkins, author of Hoodwinked, discusses the modern way of taking over a county, and offers suggestions for a new form of global economics. 

Perkins is a founder and board member of Dream Change and The Pachamama Alliance, nonprofit organizations devoted to establishing a world our children will want to inherit. He urges us to move away from predatory capitalism and to buy only from corporations that serve the public. 

For more recent information, watch John Perkins on Corporatocracy, a face-to-face interview originally webcast on September 25, 2012.
teaser: Former economic hit man John Perkins, author of Hoodwinked, discusses the modern way of taking over a county, and offers suggestions for a new form of global economics.

title: Richard Gage on 9/11 Truth
body:
Architect Richard Gage, head of Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth, discusses the structural evidence of the destruction of the World Trade Center buildings and the logical conclusions of subsequent research.

Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth is an international group of architects and engineers who’s mission is to research, compile, and disseminate scientific evidence related to the destruction of the three World Trade Center skyscrapers. They call for an open and independent investigation and support others in the pursuit of justice.

Hearing the conclusions of David Ray Griffin (a 9/11 researcher) in 2006 triggered Gage’s quest for the truth. Practicing architect for over 20 years, Richard has worked on most types of building construction, including numerous fireproofed steel-framed buildings.
teaser: Architect Richard Gage, head of Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth, discusses the structural evidence of the destruction of the World Trade Center buildings and the logical conclusions of subsequent research.

title: Billy Merritt on Superfoods
body:
Billy’s quest began at the Ashram Health Retreat of Calabasas, California where he had been sharing his love and understanding of nutrition and natural well being. Here he was formulating his favorite algaes, herbs, botanicals, probiotics, enzymes, and superfoods into nutrient-rich blends that he found to be incredibly effective. The Ashram is famous for being on the cutting edge of health programs worldwide, offering a challenging regimen of hiking, exercise, and yoga that requires active participation. So it was the perfect place to develop a superfood formula, providing guests and physical trainers with the energy and nutritional support they needed to perform such a challenging program.

After ten years of research and development, coupled with soulful dedication to the craft of creating the best superfood formula possible it is Billy created his own line of super foods. These are deeply nourishing, revitalizing, and health-transforming superfoods, that Mother Nature provides for us! It is his vision and promise that such gifts from a loving and providing Universe will support you in manifesting excellent health: a quality of Life that is yours naturally!
teaser: Billy Merritt exemplifies the shining health of someone who is dedicated to consuming greens and super foods.  Today, he formulates and sells his own line of super foods which he developed after ten years of research and development.

title: Mony Vital on Physical Immortality
body:
Mony Vital, author of Ageless Living: Freedom from the Culture of Death, discusses our culture of death, from life insurance and religion to the big business of anti-aging.

Vital is a speaker, writer and teacher on the subject of longevity and physical immortality and has studied hypnosis and somatic therapies. He is the director of Vital Energetic Balancing, a quantum mechanics technology for balancing frequencies and energies that impede the energy flow in the body.
teaser: Mony Vital, author of Ageless Living: Freedom from the Culture of Death, discusses our culture of death, from life insurance and religion to the big business of anti-aging.

title: Stephen Bassett on Disclosure
body:
Stephen Bassett, a leading advocate for ending the 63-year government imposed truth embargo regarding an extraterrestrial presence engaging the human race, discusses how disclosure is progressing and the repercussions of a government run by secrecy.

Paradigm Research Group, Stephen Bassett’s website, is one of the top clearinghouses for documents regarding governmental cover ups on the disclosure of UFOs and alien contact. Since 1996, Bassett has assisted numerous organizations and initiatives working to raise public awareness of the both the extraterrestrial presence and the truth embargo, convene open congressional hearings to take government and agency witness testimony and incite the political media to appropriately cover the attendant issues.
teaser: Stephen Bassett, a leading advocate for ending the 63-year government imposed truth embargo regarding an extraterrestrial presence engaging the human race, discusses how disclosure is progressing and the repercussions of a government run by secrecy.

title: Kim Carlsberg on Abduction
body:
Kim Carlsberg wrote her first book, Beyond My Wildest Dreams, from her own personal experiences as an abductee. It was a life changing event that happened at her Los Angeles home overlooking the ocean. Kim went through personal and professional life changes from peoples' reactions to her book and years of continuing abduction experiences. 

It is only now that she has decided to come back out into the spotlight to present a new book called, The Art of Close Encounters, which is a beautifully published book of other people’s artistic renderings of their own close encounters. Listen to Kim’s story and decide for yourself.
teaser: There’s no issue more vulnerable to the giggle factor than that of alien abduction. Kim Carlsberg wrote her first book, Beyond My Wildest Dreams, from her own personal experiences as an abductee.

title: Philip Coppens on the Ancient Alien Question
body:
Philip Coppens, author of, The Ancient Alien Question, says that science needs to step up and begin serious investigation to take this debate to the forefront. In this Skype video interview, Philip goes into the connections between civilizations and how scientists need to work together with the people who make discoveries of ancient artifacts.

Nothing has intrigued human kind more than whether or not we’ve been visited by extraterrestrials. In recent times, a flood of accounts have come out ranging from sightings and contacts to abductions. But, few examples are more fascinating than the unearthing of evidence from our ancient past.
teaser: Nothing has intrigued human kind more than whether or not we’ve been visited by extraterrestrials. Philip Coppens explains the connections between civilizations and how scientists need to work together with the people who make discoveries of ancient artifacts.

title: David Sereda on the Electro-Magnetic Human
body:
Physicist and media producer David Sereda has an innate understanding of the level of vibration and electro-magnetism at which all of humanity vibrates. In this interview, which covers a great many subjects, David talks about the source of energy coming from the galactic center and the effect it has on all life on earth.

Sereda also identifies how our Universe moves through the cosmos and what happened the last time the universe went through this particular part of the 64 million year cycle.
teaser: Physicist and media producer David Sereda has an innate understanding of the level of vibration and electro-magnetism at which all of humanity vibrates. In this interview, which covers a great many subjects, David talks about the source of energy coming from the galactic center and the effect it has on all life on earth.

title: Cynthia James on Healing the Cycles of Abuse
body:
Personal Growth Guide Cynthia James discusses her life, the personal challenges that permeated five generations of women in her family and how she chose to heal the cycles of abuse.

James describes the freedom of forgiveness and cutting the cord to the past rather than dragging old hurts and resentments along through your life. Letting go of old stories enables us to embrace and heal our pain.

For more recent information, watch Cynthia James on Your Extraordinary Essence, a face-to-face interview originally webcast on October 10, 2012.
teaser: Personal Growth Guide Cynthia James discusses her life, the personal challenges that permeated five generations of women in her family and how she chose to heal the cycles of abuse.

title: Raymond Moody on Life After Life
body:
Raymond Moody, author of Life After Life, discusses the origins of his work and the people that inspired and affected him in his early years of research, as well as what he has learned from talking to many people about their near-death experiences.

Moody also discusses his new work, the development of a new logic that enables people to be fully present in a near-death experience.

An expert on near death experiences, Moody has authored many books and academic and professional articles.
teaser: Raymond Moody, author of Life After Life, discusses the origins of his work and the people that inspired and affected him in his early years of research, as well as what he has learned from talking to many people about their near-death experiences.

title: Gregg Braden on Intelligent Design
body:
Gregg Braden and Regina discuss how we, as humans, must have come from an intelligence that is greater than the scientific facts allow, especially as so much of the recognized evidence has changed. Are we a Darwinian evolutionary species or was there an intelligent design that has guided our evolution on this planet and is continuing to shape our future? And, can we learn the vital lessons that will allow us to thrive in coming times.

Gregg is saying that we need to have a new understanding of the term Intelligent Design, as he suggests that Man did not evolve in the Darwinian sense, rather was created by some other mechanism.  He bases his evidence on several factors, not the least of which is that the human brain has been at its current size for at least 200,000 years.  In addition, he says we’re on the verge of a breakthrough of understanding according to his fractal time codes for 2011.
teaser: Gregg Braden and Regina discuss how we, as humans, must have come from an intelligence that is greater than the scientific facts allow, especially as so much of the recognized evidence has changed.

title: John Rush on Mushrooms in Christian Art
body:
John Rush, author of Mushrooms in Christian Art, discusses the human desire to alter consciousness in a culture under stress, and says that there is evidence that mushrooms have had far greater significance in our spiritual awakening than has been previously attributed.

In this fascinating interview, John talks about the origins of the “Jesus experiencing”, being derived from mushrooms and that Jesus doesn’t get written into the biblical texts until a much later time. He also touches on the Santa Claus myth actually being a visit from the local Shaman on the Winter Solstice. 

John A. Rush, Ph.D., is Professor of Anthropology at Sierra College, Rocklin, California, teaching Physical Anthropology and Magic, Witchcraft, Myth, and Religion. Dr. Rush is also a retired Clinical Anthropologist and Medical Hypnotherapist in private practice from 1972 to 2008.
teaser: John Rush, author of Mushrooms in Christian Art, discusses the human desire to alter consciousness in a culture under stress, and says that there is evidence that mushrooms have had far greater significance in our spiritual awakening than has been previously attributed.

title: Theresa Dale on Homeopathic HRT
body:
Naturopathic doctor Theresa Dale, founder of the California College of Natural Medicine, discusses her naturopathic approach to balancing hormones.

Dr. Dale explains the importance of the adrenal glands, the sensitivity of saliva testing, the purpose of homeopathy and the development and testing of hormone rejuvenation creams.
teaser: Naturopathic doctor Theresa Dale, founder of the California College of Natural Medicine, discusses her naturopathic approach to balancing hormones.

title: Paul Perry on The Afterlife
body:
Paul Perry has authored or co-authored ten books on the subject of Near Death Experiences. This 23-year long fascination began when he was approached to write a book titled, The Light Beyond, with Dr. Raymond Moody. Ten books later, Paul has used his knowledge of the subject and skills to produce a wonderful documentary titled, Afterlife. The story follows a handful of people through their journey out of the body and back using science as a backdrop of understanding.

In this companion interview to Raymond Moody, Regina discusses Paul’s movie, Afterlife and the nature of the afterlife as seen through the eyes of NDE’s. Devout Christians and devout atheists alike have profound interest in the same question: What happens when we die? This and other questions about the Afterlife are scientifically explored through modern research into near-death experiences.
teaser: What happens when we die? In this companion interview to Raymond Moody, Regina discusses Paul’s movie, Afterlife and the nature of the afterlife as seen through the eyes of NDE’s.

title: Hank Wesselman on Awakening to the Spirit World
body:
Regina Meredith talks with anthropologist Hank Wesselman about the original practice of shamanism, how it shaped the world’s spiritual traditions and why it is relevant today.

Because shamanism is experience and practice-based rather than belief-based, Hank Wesselman feels it is important for humankind to acknowledge and embrace this wisdom. In his new book, Awakening to the Spirit World, Wesselman discusses his relationship with his Hawaiian Kahuna mentor, Hale Makua, and what he was taught in the spirit world. Wesselman and co-author Sandra Ingerman bring together a circle of renowned Western shamanic elders to present a comprehensive manual for making these indigenous techniques for healing, insight and spiritual growth accessible and available in our daily lives.
teaser: Regina Meredith talks with anthropologist Hank Wesselman about the original practice of shamanism, how it shaped the world’s spiritual traditions and why it is relevant today.

title: Deborah Pratt on The Vision Quest
body:
Deborah Pratt talks about her work on Quantum Leap, and on The Vision Quest, and discusses remembering who we are and holding on to our own power in every aspect of our life.

Pratt explains that we must first forgive both ourselves and people and situations we feel have wronged us, then replace negativity with gratitude for the good things we have, then practice loving ourselves, and, finally, stand in the Now, and step into our power, light and energy.
teaser: Deborah Pratt talks about her work on Quantum Leap, and on The Vision Quest, and discusses remembering who we are and holding on to our own power in every aspect of our life.

title: Lynne Kitei on The Phoenix Lights
body:
One day, while Lynne Kitei was looking out the window of her North Phoenix home, an unexpected phenomenon entered into her life.  She noticed something on the horizon and began taking photos that could not be explained.  Her firsthand experiences, as well as her amazing photographs, are considered by optical physicists and experts in the field as historic. 

After 13 years of meticulous research, she has combined stunning data and personal interviews in The Phoenix Lights documentary, a comprehensive examination of the strange lights seen over Phoenix and throughout Arizona on March 13th 1997. The result of her inquiry is one of the best documented case histories of this event, which is captured in her book and documentary by the same title, The Phoenix Lights.
teaser: Lynne Kitei shares some of her 13 years of meticulous research on the strange lights seen over Phoenix and throughout Arizona on March 13th 1997.

title: Michael Cremo on the Origins of Humankind
body:
Where did we come from? What is the true history of humankind? Michael A. Cremo and Richard L. Thompson challenge the prevailing theory of Darwinian evolution with their groundbreaking work Forbidden Archeology: The Hidden History of the Human Race.

In this interview, Regina discusses the basis of Michael’s book, the true origins of humankind and the seemingly state sponsored promotion of Darwinian Theory within the education system. If you tell young people that they are evolved from apes then you don’t exactly start off with much of a sense of your own divinity and power. If we knew who we were from an early age, maybe our choices would be different.
teaser: In this interview, Regina discusses the basis of Michael A. Cremo’s book, Forbidden Archeology, the true origins of humankind and the seemingly state sponsored promotion of Darwinian Theory within the education system.

title: Tricia McCannon on the Annunaki
body: What do Jesus, Thoth, the Annunaki and 2012 all have in common?  To find the answer, you’ll need to watch this video.  Tricia McCannon’s expertise is in the area of the great mysteries and she has devoted her life to uncovering the mysteries that have driven the religious and spiritual practices throughout history, using academic process and clairvoyance. She is highly skilled at connecting the dots from our ancient past to our modern beliefs and is steeped in the Kybalion and Hermetic teachings.  In short, she embraces a wide swath of esoteric knowledge.
teaser: What do Jesus, Thoth, the Annunaki and 2012 all have in common?  To find the answer, you’ll need to watch this video with Tricia McCannon.

title: Donna Fisher and Dave Stetzer on Dirty Electricity
body:
Donna Fisher, author of Dirty Electricity and Electromagnetic Radiation, describes how dirty electricity has surrounded us for decades and how it impacts our health, especially where cancer is concerned. In the second part of the interview, David Stetzer discusses the technology end of this story. 

Dave Stetzer is the creator of the Stetzerizer Microsurge Meter, which measures the levels of dirty electricity in home circuits and of the Stetzerizer filter, which reduce the harmful effects of dirty current in household wiring.
teaser: Donna Fisher, author of Dirty Electricity and Electromagnetic Radiation, describes how dirty electricity has surrounded us for decades and how it impacts our health, especially where cancer is concerned. In the second part of the interview, David Stetzer discusses the technology end of this story.

title: G. Edward Griffin on Chemtrails
body:
Writer and documentary film producer, G. Edward Griffin, discusses chemtrails – what we should know about them and what we can do about them.

Griffin is known for his talent of researching difficult topics and presenting them in clear terms that all can understand. He shares what is being done to identify what is being sprayed, and why. His most recent film, What in the World Are They Spraying, looks at the controversial and hotly contested subject of chemtrails.
teaser: Writer and documentary film producer, G. Edward Griffin, discusses chemtrails – what we should know about them and what we can do about them.

title: Darryl Anka on Channeling Bashar
body:
You may have heard of the entity named Bashar.  This channeled extraterrestrial is incredibly popular with terrestrials because of his lusty sense of humor and directness.  Less is known, however, of the person through which he speaks.  In 1973 Darryl Anka witnessed UFOs at close range on two occasions.  Knowing that this was not an Earthly craft or experience, he became curious about UFOs and about paranormal phenomena.  Through his research, Darryl learned of channeling.  After experiencing a telepathic message from an ET who called himself Bashar, he realized that Bashar’s ship was the one he had seen ten years earlier.  The rest is history, as he opened his connection up to the public for question after question. 

You may have heard of the entity named Bashar. This channeled extraterrestrial is incredibly popular with terrestrials because of his lusty sense of humor and directness. Less is known, however, of the person through which he speaks. In 1973 Darryl Anka witnessed UFOs at close range on two occasions. Knowing that this was not an Earthly craft or experience, he became curious about UFO sightings and about paranormal phenomena. Through his research, Darryl learned of channeling and soon became a channeler himself. After experiencing a telepathic message from an ET contact who called himself Bashar, he realized that Bashar’s ship was the one he had seen ten years earlier.
