The rest is history, as he opened his channeling sessions up to the public for question after question.
Over the years, thousands of individuals have had the opportunity to apply these principles and see if they really work to change their lives and create the reality that they desire. Imagine, willing your physical mind through the law of attraction to change your life for the better. As Bashar’s new age wisdom has become more widely known and respected, Darryl has become in demand, but we were lucky enough to have a few moments with him at a recent conference. See Bashar’s message and determine for yourself if this multidimensional being is the real deal.
teaser: Daryl Anka channels Bashar. Over the years, thousands of individuals have had the opportunity to apply these principles and change their lives.

title: Anita Vazquez-Tibau on Mercury Free Dentistry
body:
Anita Vazquez-Tibau discusses how important it is to remove mercury and other metals from your mouth to ensure good health, no matter how well you eat or look after yourself in other ways. 

Vazquez-Tibau tells us that it is imperative to have any mercury removed correctly and to detoxify slowly and carefully with the help of a knowledgeable physician. Avoiding mercury fillings (silver fillings) in the first place is the best practice, of course, and researching additional effective ways of maintaining a healthy mouth and gums.
teaser: Anita Vazquez-Tibau discusses how important it is to remove mercury and other metals from your mouth to ensure good health, no matter how well you eat or look after yourself in other ways.

title: Elena Tonetti Vladimirova on Conscious Birthing
body:
Elena Tonetti Vladimirova discusses what childbirth was like for most Russian women in the early 1920s, and what makes positive birthing so important if we are to create a conscious living community on earth.

As a young Soviet woman from Siberia, Elena Vladimirova sought enlightened answers about the soul, birth and creative community. She joined a group of young people who broke from the repression of Soviet life to create space for themselves, joy and family. With this intension, she met Igor Charkovsky, a visionary who taught about underwater birthing, including, birthing with dolphins, who told her that if she wanted to get to the core of the country’s problem of community, she must change the way in which children come into the world. 

Vladimirova worked as Charkovsky’s assistant for a few years before stepping onto her own lifelong path of conscious birthing.
teaser: Elena Tonetti Vladimirova discusses what childbirth was like for most Russian women in the early 1920s, and what makes positive birthing so important if we are to create a conscious living community on earth.

title: Robert Moss on Active Dreaming
body:
Robert Moss, author of Active Dreaming: Journeying Beyond Limitation to a Life of Wild Freedom, discusses dreaming and daydreaming (active dreaming), and shares his wisdom about the internal dreamscape.

Moss explains that going consciously into the dream state may be the easiest way to become a lucid dreamer, and that trying to control or manipulate our dreams is like trying to control the oceans – we should, instead, to learn to navigate and have fun.
teaser: Robert Moss, author of Active Dreaming: Journeying Beyond Limitation to a Life of Wild Freedom, discusses dreaming and daydreaming (active dreaming), and shares his wisdom about the internal dreamscape.

title: Karen McCall on Financial Recovery
body:
Karen McCall was in dire straits when she was forced to deal with her money demons.  It turned into a deep spiritual process of self-evaluation that was, in turn, the start of a career in helping others to shine the light on their own money boogie men, all of which she shares in her book, Financial Recovery.

The Financial Recovery Institute, founded by Karen McCall, teaches its counselors how to help clients identify, understand and eliminate self-defeating money patterns once and for all. It also provides specific money planning tools that empower people to create spending and savings plans that meet their unique needs and fully support their individual dreams and goals.
teaser: Karen McCall talks shares her learning experience when she was forced to deal with her money demons. It turned into a deep spiritual process of self-evaluation that was, in turn, the start of a career in helping others.

title: Elena Tonetti Vladimirova on Anastasia
body: Elena Tonetti Vladimirova tells us about what she feels was the inspiration for Vladimir Megre’s series of books about a woman named Anastasia. The books became known as the Ringing Cedars series.
teaser: Elena Tonetti Vladimirova tells us about what she feels was the inspiration for Vladimir Megre’s series of books about a woman named Anastasia. The books became known as the Ringing Cedars series.

title: James Gilliland on Viewing Multi-dimensions
body:
Minister, counselor and author James Gilliand talks about the nature of some of the beings that visit his Oregon ranch and about the need for all of us to unplug from the Hollywood portrayal of the evil monster scenarios that are continually perpetuated in the mainstream media.

James Gilliland is the founder of Sattva Sanctuary, the Self Mastery Earth Institute, and ECETI (enlightened contact with extra terrestrial intelligence).
teaser: Minister, counselor and author James Gilliand talks about the nature of some of the beings that visit his Oregon ranch and about the need for all of us to unplug from the Hollywood portrayal of the evil monster scenarios that are continually perpetuated in the mainstream media.

title: Stewart Swerdlow on The Montauk Project
body:
Clairvoyant Stewart Swerdlow discusses the mysterious events of his conception, his family history, his involvement with The Montauk Project and his understanding of the planets and species that have interacted with Earth.

Swerdlow says he was the subject of experiments in the Montauk Project, a secret program for mind control. He relates his experiences and what he believes to be the reasons for the project.
teaser: Clairvoyant Stewart Swerdlow discusses the mysterious events of his conception, his family history, his involvement with The Montauk Project and his understanding of the planets and species that have interacted with Earth.

title: Bob Dean on Friends in High Places
body:
Former Command Sergeant Major Robert Dean offers his perspective on the dynamics playing out between off planet cultures, the US Military and ourselves.  In this conversation he speaks of what’s really behind the shutdown of the shuttle program, his life in this strange arena and his hope for humankind.

Relaxing with his customary cigar in the beautiful surroundings of Mount Adams, Bob shares his experiences of his current and former lives openly. Bob claims to have viewed a classified government document called, The Assessment, that allegedly discussed threats posed by alien activity on Earth.
teaser: Relaxing with his customary cigar in the beautiful surroundings of Mount Adams, former Command Sergeant Major Robert Dean shares his experiences of his current and former lives openly.

title: Douglas Dietrich on Satanism in the Military
body:
Douglas Dietrich, a former military research librarian at the San Francisco Presidio, says that he used his high clearance to acquire access to ancient documents and books containing satanic rituals, which he says are practiced by many high-ranking military officers. 

He speaks of working under an officer who was also known as a satanic priest, explains that it was the invocation of spirits by the Japanese in World War II that prompted US Military involvement in the summoning of entities, including demons.
teaser: Douglas Dietrich, a former military research librarian at the San Francisco Presidio, says that he used his high clearance to acquire access to ancient documents and books containing satanic rituals, which he says are practiced by many high-ranking military officers.

title: Neil Kramer on The Higher Self
body:
Have you ever noticed that when you set a clear or high intention, something of a lower nature inside yourself begins to interfere or sabotage your best efforts? We often respond by being at odds with ourselves, rather than trying to embrace and understand our lower functioning. 

By embracing and knowing our full selves, the lower part of ourselves included, we can truly move into higher octaves of the functioning intellectually, emotionally and spiritually. Neil Kramer speaks of these levels of awareness, and poses the question: who are the people who create what we are to believe is the norm?
teaser: What does it take for an individual to move to the higher realms? How do you know what is normal when all our input comes from someone else? These are questions that Neil Kramer has studied.

title: Patricia Albere on Evolutionary Relationships
body:
Patricia Albere has been helping people get out of their own way for over three decades.  At age 23, she was facilitating groups for a new movement, under Werner Erhard, that was later to be known as EST.  Now, she is championing Evolutionary Relationships in our intimate, social and professional lives. By removing the traditional roles and broken rules that have held us down for millennia, Evolutionary Relationships is our ideal way of interacting — recognizing that in order to succeed, we must develop the skills of ‘mutuality’ that include love, trust and sharing.

In this interview, Patricia explains that we literally have nothing of genuine value to lose if we commit to truth, which always gives way to love. Building on the most recent advances in neuroscience, and applying the wisdom of many spiritual tenets, Evolutionary Relationships is the next step in humanity’s development. It can be called ‘The Higher We’ and explores our potential to consciously engage.
teaser: In this interview, Patricia explains how Evolutionary Relationships is the next step in humanity’s development. It can be called ‘The Higher We’ and explores our potential to consciously engage.

title: George Kavassilas on Our Journey Home (Part 1)
body:
In this first segment of a two-part interview, George Kavassilas talks about his early years, his abductions by extraterrestrials and his greater awareness and understanding of our universe, who we are and our journey home.

Kavassilas has always seen the world through different eyes than those around him. From a young age, he was aware that the universe was full of life, and could see and feel life around him more deeply than others. From the age of five, he has memories of being taken from his bed at night onto ships, and being taken to other places on the planet and to other worlds. His interactions with other beings on many different levels of realities have occurred throughout his life, experiences that have included both benevolent beings, which he calls his Greater Family, and malevolent others who have the ability to appear in many guises.
teaser: In this first segment of a two-part interview, George Kavassilas talks about his early years, his abductions by extraterrestrials and his greater awareness and understanding of our universe, who we are and our journey home.

title: Bernard Haisch on The Purpose Guided Universe
body:
A remarkable discovery has emerged in astrophysics: that key properties of the Universe have just the right values to make life possible. Most scientists prefer to explain away this uniqueness, insisting that a huge, perhaps infinite, number of unseen universes must therefore exist, each randomly different from the other. That way ours only appears special because we could not exist in any of the other hypothetical universes.But what if they’re wrong? What if the special properties of our universe reflect an underlying intelligence, one that is consistent with the Big Bang as well as Darwinian evolution?

Astrophysicist Bernard Haisch explores the universe from the viewpoint of a divine order without dispelling the current scientific explorations that have got us this far.
teaser: Astrophysicist Bernard Haisch, author of The Purpose Driven Universe, says the most fundamental questions cannot be answered without acknowledging the presence of an intelligence or divine order within the universe.

title: Helaine Harris on The Love Frequency
body:
Marriage and family therapist Helaine Harris discusses using meditation tools to help clients identify and connect with their inner wisdom.

A teacher, lecturer and psychotherapist, Harris blends traditional and non-traditional therapies with Shamanism and body energies, crating a unique therapeutic style that acknowledges each soul’s journey. She is also an award-winning poet and the author of Are You In Love with a Vampire?: Healing the Relationship Drain Game.
teaser: Marriage and family therapist Helaine Harris discusses using meditation tools to help clients identify and connect with their inner wisdom.

title: Stanley Monteith on Dispelling Untruths
body:
Medical doctor, Stanley Monteith discusses his views on the current agenda for controlling America’s population through the school system, the medical system, banking and government.

Many people sense something is wrong in the United States, but don’t know what it is. Politicians support globalization, illegal immigration, war, the Patriot Act, and increased federal spending. Stanley tells us why he believes these agendas are supported. Dr. Monteith currently participates on talk radio, writes extensively and lectures on geopolitics, as well as researching the causes of America’s spiritual and moral decline.
teaser: Medical doctor, Stanley Monteith discusses his views on the current agenda for controlling America’s population through the school system, the medical system, banking and government.

title: George Kavassilas on Our Journey Home (Part 2)
body:
In this second segment of a two-part interview, George Kavassilas talks about the artificial constructs of organized religion, the fourth and fifth dimensions and our true essence as souls on this planet. 

Kavassilas has always seen the world through different eyes than those around him. From a young age, he was aware that the universe was full of life, and could see and feel life around him more deeply than others. From the age of five, he has memories of being taken from his bed at night onto ships, and being taken to other places on the planet and to other worlds. His interactions with other beings on many different levels of realities have occurred throughout his life, experiences that have included both benevolent beings, which he calls his Greater Family, and malevolent others who have the ability to appear in many guises.
teaser: In this second segment of a two-part interview, George Kavassilas talks about the artificial constructs of organized religion, the fourth and fifth dimensions and our true essence as souls on this planet.

title: Amy Ahlers on Big Fat Lies Women Tell Themselves
body:
Amy Ahlers, author of Big Fat Lies Women Tell Themselves, discusses the results of her research and what the most common lies are.

In this interview, Amy discusses the results of her research that enabled her to write the book, Big Fat Lies Women Tell Themselves” which outlines 59 big fat lies that are the most common. Take heart, though, because Amy says that nearly every woman on the planet thinks this way, even the most successful ones.

Although this is a fun title for the book, it is very serious in its intent for all women to become happier, gain more peace of mind and ultimately make themselves shine brightly. Oh, and if you don’t think this applies to men too, think again!
teaser: Amy Ahlers, author of Big Fat Lies Women Tell Themselves, discusses the results of her research and what the most common lies are.

title: Don Miguel Ruiz on The Fifth Agreement
body:
Author Don Miguel shares a story about watching one’s own movie on a screen and then watching everyone else’s movie. Once you understand that no one sees the truth about you, not even yourself, you can start living authentically, with the power to listen and create a life of personal freedom and ease.

Don Miguel shared the wisdom of his Toltec shamanic tradition in his book, The Four Agreements, which was on the New York Times Best-Seller list for seven years. He and his son, Don Jose, have written an extension of the previous four agreements, called The Fifth Agreement.
teaser: Author Don Miguel shares a story about watching one’s own movie on a screen and then watching everyone else’s movie. Once you understand that no one sees the truth about you, not even yourself, you can start living authentically, with the power to listen and create a life of personal freedom and ease.

title: Jonathan Schooler on The Decline Effect
body:
Jonathan Schooler shares the background of his discovery of the phenomena he calls the decline effect (beginner’s luck), and suggests that both a scientific explanation and an X-factor of consciousness are responsible.

Schooler researches consciousness, memory, the relationship between language and thought, problem solving, and decision making. He suggests that when you have an experience that begins with wonderful results, it is an invitation to continue on that path, but does not guarantee that the path will not also have roadblocks.
teaser: Jonathan Schooler shares the background of his discovery of the phenomena he calls the decline effect (beginner’s luck), and suggests that both a scientific explanation and an X-factor of consciousness are responsible.

title: Klaus Dona on Humanity Revised
body:
In this interview, we meet Klaus Dona at his office in Vienna and Regina holds the occipital bone of a human being that would have to have been over 25 feet tall as well as several other ancient artifacts which defies all previous historical accounts of our presence on the planet. We’ve heard of giants in legends throughout history, but here was physical proof.  This, along with other extraordinary ancient artifacts make up the body of his work today as a curator of unexplained ancient artifacts.

Klaus is an intrepid explorer and his personal integrity and charm have endeared him to many indigenous peoples who entrust him with these historical treasures.
teaser: We’ve heard of giants in legends throughout history, and Klaus Dona offers physical proof.  These, along with other extraordinary ancient artifacts, make up the body of his work today as a curator of unexplained ancient artifacts.

title: Graham Nicholls on Avenues of the Human Spirit
body:
Author and artist Graham Nicholls has been aware of beings that no one else could see from a young age. He shares his experiences and how they gave him a different perspective on reality than those around him.

Through his ability to see beyond time and space, Nicholls saw the interconnectedness and love in all things. He has conducted scientific experiments into telepathy and precognition with author and biologist Rupert Sheldrake, as part of the Perrott-Warrick Project, supported by Trinity College, Cambridge, much of which is documented in his book, Avenues of the Human Spirit. Nicholls is also the author of Navigating the Out-of-Body Experience (April 2012).
teaser: Author and artist Graham Nicholls has been aware of beings that no one else could see from a young age. He shares his experiences and how they gave him a different perspective on reality than those around him.

title: Rupert Sheldrake on Morphic Resonance
body:
Biologist Rupert Sheldrake discusses morphogenetic fields and the experiments he has run to prove telepathy between humans and telepathy between humans and animals. 

Sheldrake explains that everything in nature has a morphogenetic field, an invisible pattern in space that contains the collective memory of that species, and that these fields are the organizing principles that apply to that species.
teaser: Biologist Rupert Sheldrake discusses morphogenetic fields and the experiments he has run to prove telepathy between humans and telepathy between humans and animals.

title: Nicholas Vesey on Developing Consciousness
body:
After a trip to the Himalayas in 1979 Nicholas Vesey became interested in spirituality and enlightenment. He had various experiences there, which led him to leave his job as an advertising executive and to work in the field of self awareness. Since then, he has studied many of the techniques and practices that are used to develop a deeper experience of consciousness and for the last 10 years he has been exploring these experiences with others through his Developing Consciousness course.

One does not need to disconnect from the 3-D world to experience profound moments of insight. Indeed, some of the most poignant moments in life come amidst the chaos. Ultimately, Nicholas chose to bring his in-the-trenches path to consciousness to the world of religion, through his chosen field as a priest.
teaser: Nicholas Vesey explains that one does not need to disconnect from the 3-D world to experience profound moments of insight. Indeed, some of the most poignant moments in life come amidst the chaos.

title: Bill McKenna on The Only Lesson
body:
Bill McKenna discusses his upbringing, avoiding the wrath of his father, reaching his material dreams and finding them impermanent, developing his intuition, and discovering the root cause of his depression and anger. 

McKenna describes how his effort to understand his psychic girlfriend resulted in his own spiritual growth when he discovered the power of forgiveness and unconditional love.
teaser: Bill McKenna discusses his upbringing, avoiding the wrath of his father, reaching his material dreams and finding them impermanent, developing his intuition, and discovering the root cause of his depression and anger.

title: Marc Allen on The Greatest Secret of All
body:
Marc Allen is the owner of New World Library, publishing authors such as Shakti Gawain, Eckhart Tolle, Dan Millman and Christine Arena, he has had the honor of his company being named ‘Best Place to Work’. Regina had to find out more about the man who publishes thousands of enlightening books and what made him tick. 

Marc’s story is so entertaining and educational and has him going from near bankruptcy to profitability while maintaining a happy crew of staff, suppliers and authors. In his own book, The Greatest Secret of All, he talks about how fear and love can be managed to make your dreams come true, in real, tangible, measurable ways and even those who think they are wandering artists (like Marc) can understand and apply the principles to live the life only they have dreamed of.
teaser: Regina talks with Marc Allen, the owner of New World Library, to find out more about the man who publishes thousands of enlightening books and what made him tick.

title: Raymond Tarpey on Our Time Has Come
body:
Historian Raymond Tarpey discusses his research linking ancient China and the ancient Maya and explains how the readings of Edger Cayce provided answers that were not available in mainline histories.

Tarpey also discusses the 13 crystal skulls said to be distributed around the planet, and tells the history of Mu/Lemuria (the people of mud) and Atlantis (the people of wood) as related in Mayan records.
teaser: Historian Raymond Tarpey discusses his research linking ancient China and the ancient Maya and explains how the readings of Edger Cayce provided answers that were not available in mainline histories.

title: James Martinez on Cold Fusion
body: For decades we’ve been reading about the progress of cold fusion technology, which is considered a stable source of nuclear fusion at room temperature.  Many view it as the holy grail—the future energy source of humankind. Others have consistently sought to denigrate the potential of this technology. Regardless, it appears that cold fusion may now be quietly emerging into the global marketplace beginning this year, 2012. No longer some faraway dream of providing people with clean, cheap, limitless energy throughout the planet, the emergence of cold fusion promises to fundamentally change the way we live.
teaser: James Martinez has been following the subject of Cold Fusion and its associated ‘free energy’ capabilities for a number of years and has recently been connecting with the creators of various devices.

title: Philip Coppens on Erich von Däniken’s Odyssey of the Gods
body:
The human species is beginning to ask new questions as to our origins and as to the presence of extraterrestrial life on Earth. In this interview, Philip speaks of Erich von Däniken’s newest book titled, Odyssey of the Gods.

Using painstaking archaeological research and evidence from the writings of Plato and Aristotle, he suggests that the Greek myths were, in fact, very much a reality. He suggests that the Greek gods were actually extraterrestrial beings who arrived on Earth many thousands of years ago. You may find von Däniken’s conclusions astounding, but they are argued with such vigor and clarity that you’ll be forced to consider the implications of his findings for mankind.
teaser: Editor Philip Coppens discusses Erich von Däniken’s book, Odyssey of the Gods, in which von Däniken speaks to the idea that the beings the Greeks called gods were actually extraterrestrials that arrived on Earth thousands of years ago.

title: Gerald Cohen on The Healing Process
body:
Health is our birthright.

Dr. Gerald Cohen came to understand, at an early stage of his education, that the healing process is far more complicated than once understood. For over 30 years, Gerald has earned a long history of successfully solving the puzzle of why people have chronic health problems and/or are functioning at a suboptimal level. Our bodies have brilliant and sophisticated regulatory systems that were designed to keep us healthy and vibrant until a very ripe old age.

In addition to his training in chiropractic medicine and homeopathy, Gerald has made a deep study of the spiritual implications involved in healing the human body. He has distilled this vast and comprehensive understanding into a system he calls the healing process.

There is so much information in this interview that we are sure you will want to watch it many times over.
teaser: Dr. Gerald Cohen came to understand, at an early stage of his education, that the healing process is far more complicated than once understood. He has distilled his vast and comprehensive understanding of healing modalities into a system he calls the healing process.

title: Harvey Bigelsen on The Medical Conspiracy
body:
Dr. Harvey Bigelsen, author of The Medical Conspiracy in America, discusses how the medical establishment uses its power to keep new and alternative treatments away from their client base through coercion, legal witch-hunts and law making. He also talks about stem cell therapy.

Dr. Bigelsen is the first medical doctor to practice isopathy (biological medicine) in North America. As the first president of the Arizona Homeopathic Medical Board, Dr. Bigelsen drafted guidelines and standards for the practice of Holistic Medicine in Arizona that set the precedent in the United States.
teaser: Dr. Harvey Bigelsen, author of The Medical Conspiracy in America, discusses how the medical establishment uses its power to keep new and alternative treatments away from their client base through coercion, legal witch-hunts and law making.

title: Christine Arylo on Choosing Me before We
body:
When we enter into intimate relationships, we often leave ourselves behind in the process. Seeking approval and looking for non-conflicted companionship, we begin to morph into a creature that we hope the other person will love or like. Our personal sovereignty and individual uniqueness circles the drain and we often become a shell of ourselves. This is more often true for women than for men and most of us succumb to one extent or another. Christine Arylo addresses this phenomenon in her book, Choosing Me Before We.  

Christine’s book is designed to challenge and guide women to create the relationships they want instead of the ones they often find themselves stuck with. Although this is focused primarily towards women, the essence of what Christine says is applicable to all, especially teens and young adults who are indoctrinated by mainstream media messages of identity.

Whether you’re in an intimate relationship or have chosen to go it alone, Christine encourages everyone to have a love affair with yourself, first.
teaser: Whether you’re in an intimate relationship or have chosen to go it alone, Christine Arylo encourages everyone to have a love affair with yourself, first.

title: Foster Gamble on the Thrive Movement
body:
Not all conspiracy theories about the new world are fake. When Foster Gamble, an heir to the Procter and Gamble fortune, became aware of the truth as to how the people of the planet have been controlled by the ruling elite, he and his wife, Kimberly Carter Gamble, dedicated themselves to creating a cohesive film. It is a story of the potential of human beings, the quashing of that potential, and ending with the call for recovering our thriving world through activism. Called Thrive: What on Earth Will it Take?, the film has already had more than two million views around the world.
The purpose behind the Thrive movie is to highlight the problem areas and create a solution strategy to navigate through the coming times. It offers promising possibilities for creating a world in which nobody’s rights are violated and every person has the opportunity to thrive. Watch the full-length documentary Thrive: What on Earth Will it Take? Follow us down the rabbit hole and find out.
teaser: In this interview with Foster Gamble, he talks about his life as part of the Gamble dynasty, his early awakening and the path that lead him to create the Thrive movement for the evolution of humanity.

title: Jerry Day on Removing Smart Meters
body:
A rising number of citizens in the United States are becoming concerned about the Smart Meter devices being installed on the side of their homes, often without their awareness or permission. These meters are now being termed as surveillance devices, emitting sometimes high levels of radiation into our homes. Jerry Day has not only been informing people as to what these meters are doing, but how to legally remove them. He says the process is not for the faint hearted, or the amateur electrician, but it can be done.

He is getting the message out, that the Smart Meter is a surveillance device that monitors your energy consumption behavior and emits biologically destructive pulsed radiation in your home. When you are made aware that your power company has no rightful access to enter your property and install them, then it gives you an opportunity to do something lawful about it.
teaser: A rising number of citizens in the United States are becoming concerned about the Smart Meter devices being installed on the side of their homes. Jerry Day has not only been informing people as to what these meters are doing, but how to legally remove them.

title: Gregg Braden on Deep Truth
body:
Best-selling author and visionary scientist Gregg Braden suggests that the hottest topics that divide us as families, cultures and nations (seemingly disparate issues such as war, terrorism, abortion, genocide, poverty, economic collapse, climate change, and nuclear threats) are related, that they all stem from a worldview based on the false assumptions of an incomplete science.

In his newest book, Deep Truth, Gregg ventures into areas that are threatening to the established scientific community, specifically that modern civilization is far older than is taught in schools, that the human behavior is not the primary factor in global warming and that Nature is hardwired for peace, not competition and war. Once again, Gregg enthusiastically shares his vision of where humanity is headed.
teaser: Best-selling author and visionary scientist Gregg Braden suggests that the hottest topics that divide us as families, cultures and nations are related, that they all stem from a worldview based on the false assumptions of an incomplete science.

title: Penney Peirce on Frequency
body:
Penney Peirce discusses feeling our personal vibration and intentionally working with energy to transform our life. She tells us that finding our home frequency — our highest, most natural personal vibration — can enable us to maximize clarity, minimize struggle and discover new talents and capacities. 

In her latest book Frequency: The Power of Personal Vibration, Peirce, explores the dynamics of energy, personal resonance, and our accelerating ultra sensitivity. 

Science has long taught reliance on what can bee seen and touched, and is just beginning to discover that everything is vibrating energy. Our personal vibration communicates who we are to the world and helps shape our reality.
teaser: Penney Peirce discusses feeling our personal vibration and intentionally working with energy to transform our life. She tells us that finding our home frequency — our highest, most natural personal vibration — can enable us to maximize clarity, minimize struggle and discover new talents and capacities.

title: Jim Self on The Shift: Fourth Dimension Consciousness
body:
It is said that human beings are born with an open connection to our soul and that over time we lose that direct connection. We slowly begin to conform, our dreams shut down and we forget where we go at night, when the spirit leaves the body, to refresh itself and to connect with other souls. 

Jim Self, founder of Mastering Alchemy and an international speaker, goes to his soul’s home place, every night. There, he meets with beings and ascended masters who explain how life in the cosmos works and what this great shift means, in very real terms.
teaser: Jim Self, founder of Mastering Alchemy and an international speaker, goes to his soul’s home place, every night. There, he meets with beings and ascended masters who explain how life in the cosmos works and what this great shift means, in very real terms.

title: Adele Seronde on Our Sacred Garden – The Living Earth
body: Adele Seronde comes from a long line of painters, weavers, woodworkers, and poets, so it is no surprise that she is a painter and a poet, as well as a community and environmental activist. A long time resident of Sedona, she has just completed her book, Our Sacred Garden: The Living Earth. Adele insists that once we lose our connection with nature, we lose our connection with self. She keeps her own connection through poetry, art and gardening.
teaser: Growing up with a family that had a passion for gardening, Adele Seronde has dedicated her life to assisting humanity to gain a connection with the earth, beginning at childhood.

title: Doug Bentley on Deeksha and the Oneness Meditation
body:
Oneness Guide, Doug Bentley, was sitting in Washington D.C. working in the computer industry. After watching videos from CMN and other sites, he started on a journey that led him to the practice of Deeksha. The journey of awakening is the journey of the Kundalini, which is a latent spiritual energy at the base of the spine. 

All ancient cultures and paths understood that to move into higher states of consciousness, one would need to have their Kundalini awakened. Seekers of awakening would seek out great masters and awakened beings to receive the Blessing/Energy Transfer that would initiate this process. This Blessing to awaken and divinely guide the Kundalini, is historically called Deeksha.

Doug is now one of a handful of guides traveling the globe offering Deeksha to anyone that can attend a Oneness Meditation event and dedicates his life to this practice.
teaser: Doug Bentley is one of a handful of guides traveling the globe offering Deeksha, a blessing to awaken and divinely guide the Kundalini, to anyone that can attend a Oneness Meditation event and dedicates his life to this practice.

title: Pravir Malik on Redesigning the Stock Market
body:
Pravir Malik, author of Redesigning the Stock Market, discusses the birth of the stock market in the Netherlands and how it has progressed to the point where it is unsustainable.

Malik manages the design, development and implementation of Stanford University Medical Center’s Performance Management System, and is the Founder of Aurosoorya, a company that assists organizations minimize the impact of stress on productivity and performance.
teaser: Pravir Malik, author of Redesigning the Stock Market, discusses the birth of the stock market in the Netherlands and how it has progressed to the point where it is unsustainable.

title: William Henry on The Light of Sion
body:
William Henry, author The Secret of Sion, discusses his decoding of Gnostic gospels and sacred art that reveals that Jesus ascended and will return by means of a stargate, that advanced humans live in the center of the galaxy, and that humans transform into beings of light.

As predicted by ancient prophecy, the light of the Milky Way’s center, called Sion, is rising…and so is our soul’s vibration. We are being anointed in the hidden power of its rays. Henry explains that the ancients knew of stargates and that we, as a light being (in our rainbow body), are stargate devices.
teaser: William Henry, author The Secret of Sion, discusses his decoding of Gnostic gospels and sacred art that reveals that Jesus ascended and will return by means of a stargate, that advanced humans live in the center of the galaxy, and that humans transform into beings of light.

title: John Van Auken on the Involution of Humankind
body:
Author John Van Auken, a Director at the Association for Research and Enlightenment (A.R.E.), discusses the multidimensional origins of humankind, through the lens of Edgar Cayce’s reading and the ancient civilizations of Lemuria and Atlantis.

Auken’s expertise is mysticism, particularly Egyptian and Christian mysticism and meditation. He has appeared on several television and radio programs, including the Discovery Channel’s, Searching for Atlantis, and the History Channel’s, Digging for the Truth.
teaser: Author John Van Auken, a Director at the Association for Research and Enlightenment (A.R.E.), discusses the multidimensional origins of humankind, through the lens of Edgar Cayce’s reading and the ancient civilizations of Lemuria and Atlantis.

title: Dawn Hogue on Massotherapy
body:
Dawn Hogue grew up within walking distance of the Edgar Cayce’s Association of Research and Enlightenment and was introduced to his work by a friend who handed her a book on dreams. She soon found herself resonating with the Cayce work on attitudes and emotions, which sparked a lifelong interest with his work, and lead her to train at the Cayce/Reilly School to learn massotherapy.

As a psychotherapist, Dawn easily incorporated her understanding of the mind/body connection to her body work. Today, she’s a teacher and administrator at the Cayce/Reilly School of Massotherapy. Applying Edgar Cayce’s readings and healing techniques, Dawn brings a detailed look into some of the ways we can heal ourselves and each other.
teaser: Applying Edgar Cayce’s readings and healing techniques, Dawn Hogue brings a detailed look into some of the ways we can heal ourselves and each other.

title: Sidney Kirkpatrick on Edgar Cayce: An American Prophet
body:
Author and documentary filmmaker Sydney Kirkpatrick discusses his research of the American prophet Edgar Cayce, conducted with exclusive access to Cayce’s personal papers and trance readings. Kirkpatrick captured Cayce’s life in detail in his book, Edgar Cayce: An American Prophet.

Edgar Cayce is known as the Sleeping Prophet, and his work has been documented in over 14,000 readings, which have been studied for several decades. His amazingly accurate medical advice and diagnosis, given during the first part of the last century, are better known than is the scope of his influence in the world. Sidney Kirkpatrick lectures on the life, readings and information from Edgar Cayce’s readings as well as writing a regular column for Venture Inward, the A.R.E. newsletter.
teaser: Author and documentary filmmaker Sydney Kirkpatrick discusses his research of the American prophet Edgar Cayce, conducted with exclusive access to Cayce’s personal papers and trance readings. Kirkpatrick captured Cayce’s life in detail in his book, Edgar Cayce: An American Prophet.

title: Howard Martin on Creating Global Coherence
body:
According to Howard Martin, of the HeartMath Institute, “coming from the heart” means that we’re both learning to listen to the whisper of the heart. It is learning to come into a mental, emotional and biological state of coherence which feels much like peace.  Not only does this coherence change the course of our lives, it may even change the course of the planet.

Howard Martin is co-author with Doc Childre of The HeartMath Solution, published in 2000 by Harper San Francisco. In this interview, Howard talks about the creation of the Institute and the how HeartMath works for people from all walks of life. He also speaks about the Global Coherence Initiative, a science-based, co-creative project to unite people in heart-focused care and intention, to facilitate the shift in global consciousness from instability and discord to balance, cooperation and enduring peace.
teaser: According to Howard Martin, of the HeartMath Institute, “coming from the heart” means that we’re both learning to listen to the whisper of the heart. In this interview, Howard talks about the creation of the Institute and the Global Coherence Initiative.

title: Claude Swanson on The Science of the Unseen
body:
Physicist Claude Swanson discusses the subtle energy field, sometimes called chi, that permeates all things and affects all systems, but is very difficult to measure. 

For the last fifteen years, interspersed with his conventional professional career in applied physics, Dr. Swanson has pursued investigations into unconventional physics. His principle interest has been unified field theory, the so-called Theory of Everything that could explain the universe at the deepest level, which has led him to investigate many aspects of the paranormal.
teaser: Physicist Claude Swanson discusses the subtle energy field, sometimes called chi, that permeates all things and affects all systems, but is very difficult to measure.

title: Sidney Kirkpatrick on Hitler’s Holy Relics
body:
Sidney Kirkpatrick, author of Hitler’s Holy Relics, discusses the history of the Spear of Destiny, thought to be the spear that was driven into the side of Jesus during the crucifixion, and Adolf Hitler’s obsession with the artifact.

Also called the Spear of Longinus, this Holy Roman Empire relic has held a spellbinding power over military leaders throughout the ages, including General George Patton.
teaser: Sidney Kirkpatrick, author of Hitler’s Holy Relics, discusses the history of the Spear of Destiny, thought to be the spear that was driven into the side of Jesus during the crucifixion, and Adolf Hitler’s obsession with the artifact.

title: Henry Reed on Dreaming for Humanity
body:
Henry Reed, called the father of the modern dream work movement, shares his journey of bringing the dream state to a new, more useful level for humanity. His specialty is cultivating the creative spirit in others, working from both humanistic and transpersonal viewpoints.

Henry Reed rescued dreams from psychotherapy by creating a journal that showed how many people in the world were using their dreams for constructive purposes. Reed makes a strong case for remembering our dreams, not just for personal application, but for the sake of humanity.
teaser: Henry Reed, called the father of the modern dream work movement, shares his journey of bringing the dream state to a new, more useful level for humanity.

title: Thom Rogers on Steps to Manifestation
body:
Thom Rogers, medical chiropractor and founder of the Optimal Modification institute, accesses, evaluates and helps balance energy fields. This extends from human beings to corporations. The greatest prevailing blockage to creating our good, Tom says, is that we are not remaining intently focused on what we wish to create; rather, we allow the chaos and negativity to distract us from our own creation.

In spite of the high stress and chaos factors that are in place throughout the world right now, it would do us well to understand that this cycle has a purpose: to break old patterns in all ways. Still, many of us are feeling hopeless and not inclined to actively participate in creating our own new reality.
teaser: In spite of the high stress and chaos factors that are in place throughout the world right now, it would do us well to understand that this cycle has a purpose: to break old patterns in all ways. Thom Rogers explains how to use your imagination to focus on what you wish to create.
